title.rendered: Air Greenland Airlines (Greenlandair) in Nuussuaq, Greenland

content.rendered:
Air Greenland, also known as Greenlandair, is the flag carrier airline of Greenland, owned by the Greenlandic Government. It operates a fleet of 32 aircraft, including 1 airliner used for transatlantic and charter flights, 9 fixed-wing aircraft primarily serving the domestic network, and 22 helicopters feeding passengers from the smaller communities into the domestic airport network. Flights to heliports in the remote settlements are operated on contract with the government of Greenland.

 

Air Greenland Airlines Address :  Nuuk Airport, Nuussuaq, Greenland

Phone number : +299 34 34 34

Air Greenland Airlines Customer Care number: +299 70 12 12

Opening hours:
Monday – Friday 10 AM – 2 PM
Saturday 7 AM – 1 PM
Sunday Closed

Email:

Call center: websupport@airgreenland.gl

Charter: charter@airgreenland.gl

Cargo: gohfb@airgreenland.gl

Group Travels: group@airgreenland.gl

Air Greenland Airlines Official website : https://www.airgreenland.com/

Fleet size:
Fixed-wing – 9

  • Airbus A330-200
  • Airbus A330-800
  • Beechcraft B200 King Air
  • De Havilland Canada DHC-8-200

Helicopter – 18

  • Bell 212
  • Eurocopter AS350
  • Sikorsky S-61N
  • Airbus Helicopters H225

Air Greenland Airlines Baggage Allowance

Air Greenland Airlines Baggage

View Air Greenland Airlines Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Traveling with Pet in Air Greenland Airlines

  • Only dogs ang cats are accepted as animals in the cabin.

Queries handled by Air Greenland Airlines Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Club Timmisa

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Greenland Airlines in Nuussuaq, Greenland Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Greenland Airlines in Nuussuaq, Greenland: (click on the stars below)
